name: Fairwell (SAE Amsterdam)
description:
Fairwell

3D action adventure

You are Isaac, a young boy, deep in coma by an accident. In his mind Isaac has to find his way around a strange island. Can he ever escape this evil carnival? Find all the coins you can, you will need them to trade for info at the fortune teller. Once you powered up the attractions, you can go for a ride, but watch out for the clowns. Will Isaac ever awake again?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

SAE Amsterdam Student project 2013 

  • 3 months time 
  • 12 game students 
  • 9 audio students 
  • 1 programmer
